content.description:
Perform an athletic sequence (12a) past the first bolt to an okay stance and clip the second bolt.  Climb up and right through a powerful boulder problem and clip the third bolt (which can be difficult to clip).  Pump past two more bolts to the anchor. 

  I'd recommend stick clipping the first bolt as the climbing is relatively hard right off the bat.
content.location: The steep overhanging wall a bit left of The Sighting

content.description: Work you way up either side of the slaby face, then using big holds climb the overhanging face to the anchors.
content.location: Look for a nice, 6-foot wide, yellow slab at the left side of the wall containing Econoline and Demon in My Semen.

content.description:
Scramble up to high bolt. Climb up to third bolt passing sketchy block on your left. When we attempted to trundle the sketchy block it wasn't budging. Just the same leave it alone. From last bolt finish up slightly right to undercling then tiny finger/layback seam that top out at jug and anchors.   There is a crack/corner far to the right that has lots of chossy stuff (stay near bolt line) - belayer beware. 

  The route is pumpy and sequential
content.location: Last route on right side of Train in Vain Wall before The Sighting.

content.description: Most start below and left of first bolt others start on mono directly below first bolt. Climb to second bolt. Move left to big crimp near arete. From there go up right to big ledge. Easier to top.
content.location: First route on left side of steep wall

content.description:
Climb face through 3 bolts.   Then a bit run out to 4th bolt. There is a rotten, chossy section to your left. stay away! (goes with out saying, really)   Clip 5th bolt and roll to anchors.   Harder climbing right of bolt line all the way to just beyond the last bolt then immediately move left. 

  Stay away from the choss on descent also.
Thin face climbing past 3 bolts to gain a dirty ledge then easier climbing past 2 bolts to the anchors.
content.location: Third bolted line on the Train in Vain Sector, just left of Demon in My Semen and just right of an often vegetated, broken area.

content.description: Climb up to a hanging block and clip the first bolt (high but easy climbing) thin face climbing past two bolts lets you gain a ledge.  A reachy move to gain the rail and this one is in the bag.
content.location: 1st route on the Train In Vain Sector.

content.description: Start right and up on a ledge right of Flex All. Follow 2 bolts up thin holds and finish on Train in Vain anchors
Climbs around the bouldery route Train in Vain (5.12c) in Safe Harbor South.
